channel.title: Saving? [508]
channel.description: How can i make it so in the Quest Tab, the quest guide is saved so that if you've started the quest, it's all saved? Dragon Slayer was already added...And it saves if you log out and in... So how would i make it so that my new quest log saves? Help will be appreciated.

item.title: Saving? [508]
item.dc:creator: @i0wnuall i0wnuall
item.description:
@i0wnuall wrote:

How can i make it so in the Quest Tab, the quest guide is saved so that if you’ve started the quest, it’s all saved?
Dragon Slayer was already added…And it saves if you log out and in…
So how would i make it so that my new quest log saves?
Help will be appreciated.
